Net wt. 5 1/2 oz. (156g)***"    UPC:  58071 00112  Can code beginning with OCC.    Label has a yellow background with a red border on the bottom and multiple colored lettering.    Smoked Chinook (aka King) Salmon with brown sugar, salt and smoked with hardwoods was distributed as brites in 5.5oz cans.  Can code beginning with OCC.
reason_for_recall: All cans and pouches of Skipanon Brand seafood, including smoked salmon products are being recalled due to lack of documentation and possible under-processed product.  Under-processed seafood could lead to contamination with Clostridium botulinum.
